name: Super Dog (Arcade/HTML5) (v1.1)
description:
Play as Super Dog and collect items to win and/or get the highest score!

Super Dog is 22 years old as of 2079, and in this, his first large-scale adventure, he must advance through many very challenging levels to infiltrate the evil lair and defeat their insane robo-weapon! Be sure to collect items, and read the LEVEL GUIDE to win! THE LEVEL GUIDE IS THERE TO HELP YOU PROGRESS, SO USE IT!

Controls: Arrow keys to move (UP to jump), and "Z" as FIRE button, and "1" key as  START.

Level guides: [ PDF ], [ PPSX ]

Want to mod the game? Try downloading the moddable files in the description of the launch video: Here - If this game is modified by you, DO NOT RE-PUBLISH IT. Documentation is fine by me, just don't publish your mod.
